summary_md: Belgium, in the year 2024, has a GDP per capita of 44,838 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), with an inflation rate of 3.14% (FP.CPI.TOTL.ZG), and an unemployment rate of 5.49% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS). The average life expectancy is 82.40 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), and internet usage stands at 94.60% (IT.NET.USER.ZS). The country's export growth is at 79.22% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).

sections.economy_md: Belgium's economy is characterized by a GDP per capita of 44,838 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD) and an export growth of 79.22% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).
sections.labor_md: The labor market shows an unemployment rate of 5.49% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS), indicating the general employment situation.
sections.digital_md: With an internet usage rate of 94.60% (IT.NET.USER.ZS), Belgium demonstrates a significant level of digital connectivity.
sections.health_env_md: The average life expectancy in Belgium is 82.40 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), reflecting the country's health environment.
